info.title: Code Compiler API
info.description: API for code compilation and execution

400.description: Invalid input or user already exists

parameters.name: promotionId
parameters.description: ID of the promotion to update

credits.description: New credit amount for the promotion

startDate.description: New start date for the promotion

endDate.description: New end date for the promotion

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of top users to retrieve

400.description: Invalid email domain or user already exists

planCredits.description: Number of credits from the user's plan, or 'Unlimited' for yearly plans

totalCredits.description: Total number of available credits, or 'Unlimited' for yearly plans

subscriptionEnd.description: End date of the current subscription, null for free plans

monthlySpend.description: Total spend in last 30 days in rupees

amount.description: Change in balance over last 24 hours in rupees

percentage.description: Percentage change in balance over last 24 hours

200.description: Credits purchased successfully or Razorpay order created

500.description: An error occurred while fetching subscription history

get.summary: Get all subscription plans with details

post.summary: Create a Razorpay order for subscription

schema.description: ID of the plan to create order for (excluding free plan)
ID of the plan to downgrade to

400.description: Invalid plan or downgrade not allowed

500.description: An error occurred while fetching usage data

get.summary: Get usage statistics for a specific language

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: Programming language to get statistics for

404.description: No usage data found for this language

500.description: An error occurred while fetching language usage data

get.description: Retrieve analytics data. Admins see all data, users see their own data only.

parameters.name: start_time
parameters.description: Start time for data range (ISO 8601 format)

parameters.name: end_time
parameters.description: End time for data range (ISO 8601 format)
